topics.name: DEGEN Tipping & Rewards Surge
topics.explanation: High community engagement around the $DEGEN token, focusing on tipping mechanics and reward distribution, shaping platform culture.

topics.name: Interactive Frames & Games Evolving
topics.explanation: Users actively exploring and discussing Farcaster Frames, especially for creating novel interactive experiences and games.

topics.name: Users Hit Storage Limits
topics.explanation: Growing discussion about Farcaster storage constraints, prompting users to check usage and seek solutions like caststorage.com.

topics.name: Farcaster Native Tipping Feature
topics.explanation: Discussion surrounding the implementation and potential impact of a native Farcaster tipping feature, distinct from specific token tips.

topics.name: Photo Galleries Emerge in Frames
topics.explanation: A novel use case for Farcaster Frames gains traction, with users creating and sharing visually appealing photo galleries within casts.
